title: Sample E-commerce Platform
shortDesc: Custom e-commerce solution with inventory management and payment processing
longDesc: A comprehensive e-commerce platform built for a local retailer, featuring product catalog management, inventory tracking, secure payment processing, and customer management. The solution streamlined their online sales process and improved customer experience.

title: Sample Business Automation
shortDesc: Workflow automation system for small business operations
longDesc: Developed a comprehensive automation system that streamlined various business processes including customer onboarding, invoice generation, and reporting. This solution saved the client over 20 hours per week in manual tasks.
